name: El Bandito - Ready Steady Shoot - Addicting Cowboy Gunslinger One Touch Phone Game
name_original: El Bandito - Ready Steady Shoot - Addicting Cowboy Gunslinger One Touch Phone Game
description:
*** Best Gunslinger Game Ever ***

How long time would you survive in the Wild West, where gunslingers rules the land? Only your speed will save you!

El Bandito is a beautiful and addictive tap-first game.

Play face-to-face with a friend on a single screen in 2, 3 or 4 player mode or sharpen your skills alone in the private battle-field against your device.

Classmates, Colleagues and Family members can now get back to a single table and get lots of fun, laughter and excitement.

Make sure your average draw speed gets better and better everyday because that matters while reporting and competing in Game centre.

A multiplayer game for quick and fast drawing of guns, to shoot your opponent in the wild western style. Always be ready to draw your revolver when a boom sounds. Nothing matters in this game but a quick reaction. Quickfire, quickdraw whatever they call it, you gotta duel the opponent as soon as possible. A mesmerising wildwest and dueling experience all in your phone.

So.....Are you fast enough?
Are you the fastest gunslinger?

*** I played this game with my friends and they love it!!!! Every time I have to tap faster to beat my friend. So addictive and great game design. Highly recommended!! ***
